com.google.api.ads.common.lib.factory.helper

Interface AdsServiceClientFactoryHelper<C extends AdsServiceClient<S,D>,S extends AdsSession,D extends AdsServiceDescriptor>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - the subclass of AdsServiceClient
    S - the subclass of AdsSession
    D - the subclass of AdsServiceDescriptor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdWordsServiceClientFactoryHelper, BaseAdsServiceClientFactoryHelper, DfaServiceClientFactoryHelper, DfpServiceClientFactoryHelper

    public interface AdsServiceClientFactoryHelper<C extends AdsServiceClient<S,D>,S extends AdsSession,D extends AdsServiceDescriptor>
    Interface for helpers of factories which creates ads service clients.
    Author:
    Adam Rogal

      • createServiceDescriptor

        D createServiceDescriptor(Class<?> interfaceClass,
                        String version)
        Creates an AdsServiceDescriptor for a specified service.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - the ads service that we want a descriptor for
        version - of the service
        Returns:
        a descriptor of the requested service

      • createAdsServiceClient

        C createAdsServiceClient(D adsServiceDescriptor,
                       S adsSession)
                                                       throws ServiceException
        Creates an AdsServiceClient for the descriptor, session, and endpoint.
        Parameters:
        adsServiceDescriptor - the ads service descriptor
        adsSession - the session
        Returns:
        the service client
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if there was a problem creating the client

      • determineVersion

        String determineVersion(Class<?> interfaceClass)
        Determines what API version an ads service belongs to.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - the interface class of the service
        Returns:
        a string representation of the version of this service

      • checkServiceClientPreconditions

        void checkServiceClientPreconditions(S adsSession,
                                   Class<?> interfaceClass)
                                     throws ServiceException
        Checks preconditions of the session and interface and throws an exception if the client cannot be generated.
        Parameters:
        adsSession - the session containing the authentication method
        interfaceClass - the ads service that a client is being generated for
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if the preconditions are not met for service client creation
